name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note 1:** In the case of multiple simultaneous tumors, code the tumor with the greatest extension.

**Note 2:**  Skin ulceration does not alter the Summary Stage.

**Note 3:** Skin of  genital sites is not included in this scheme. These sites are skin of vulva (C51,0-C51.2, C51.8-C51.9), skin of penis (C60.0-C60.1, C60.8-C60.9) and skin of scrotum (C63.2)
footnotes:
\## Considered regional in Historic Stage
\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Stage Guide
